ext_description.message: Instant disposable email addresses â€” generate a @tempy.email inbox from any website. No signup, no personal info, fully anonymous.

popup_hint_right_click.message: Click Generate or right-click an email field on any website.

popup_consent_required_body.message: Please review and accept data transmission to use Tempy Email.

error_rate_limit.message: Rate limit reached. Please wait a moment and try again.

error_data_consent_required.message: Please accept data transmission to use Tempy Email.

consent_intro.message: To generate disposable inboxes and show messages, this extension needs to send limited data to tempy.email.

consent_data_sent_body.message: Mailbox creation requests and the generated mailbox address when fetching messages.

consent_local_body.message: Your settings and most recent generated address.

consent_no_collect_body.message: Browsing history, search terms, analytics, or tracking data.

consent_decline_note.message: If you decline, the extension cannot generate inboxes or fetch messages.

consent_status_accepted.message: Thanks! You can close this tab.

consent_status_declined.message: Data transmission disabled. You can change this later by reopening the consent page.
